d1_text:
Npc0439:
ï¿½Hey [PRINT_NAME NESS]![PAUSE 20]  You're just here to bother me, aren't you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You can call me Master Pokey,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½since Mr. Carpainter made me an important person in Happy-Happyism.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You should join us,[PAUSE 15] but I know you won't...[PAUSE 15] I'm glad I joined...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm not going to fight you,[PAUSE 15] but these guys will...[PAUSE 15] Later potater...[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[CLR_FLAG ENEMY_SUPPRESS]
[CLR_FLAG POKEY_OUTSIDE_PAULA_CABIN]
[UNFREEZE_NPC 439]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 440 274]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 441 275]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 442 276]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[FREEZE_NPC 440]
[FREEZE_NPC 441]
[FREEZE_NPC 442]
[GOSUB L_C68531]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C795BD]
[PAUSE 1][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 440 635]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 441 635]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 442 635]
[PAUSE 60][RESET_OSS_FLAG]
[END]
